shows.description: Catch Peter Kay as the wheeler-dealing dad in this 70s-set sitcom
shows.descriptionEpg: Peter Kay and Lucy Speed star in this 70s-set sitcom. Follow the real-life ups and downs of a young boy and his family. Expect cheeky scheming and a wedding looming.

shows.title: Slip
shows.description: Sexy comedy - Mae leaps into a new life with every one night stand
shows.descriptionEpg: Zoe Lister-Jones stars as a restless young woman in this sexy comedy. After a ‘slip up’ with a neighbour, she finds herself thrust into parallel worlds… will she find her way back?

shows.title: Kid Sister
shows.description: She loves the wrong guy... and she's pregnant. Get ready to happy-cry
shows.descriptionEpg: Brand new comedy about love, faith and family. A young Jewish woman grapples with the pressure of conforming to her family's wishes while following her heart's desires.

shows.title: Dietland
shows.description: A wickedly sharp satire about one woman's journey of self-discovery
shows.descriptionEpg: Wickedly sharp satire about the issues women face  - Julia Margolis stars. A ghostwriter for a glossy magazine editor goes on a self-discovery journey.

collection.page: Hundreds of drama boxsets... and all available for free!

shows.title: The Flash
shows.description: The fastest man alive - stream the epic all-action DC superhero series
shows.descriptionEpg: The fastest man alive - stream ahead of the new series! Struck by a thunder bolt, a scientist gains the gift of superhuman speed and vows to protect his city from evil.

shows.title: Arrow
shows.description: A billionaire playboy turns vigilante - stream every single series
shows.descriptionEpg: A billionaire playboy turns vigilante - watch every episode. After being marooned on a remote island, Oliver returns home with a vow to wage war on crime.

shows.title: Black Lightning
shows.description: Back in a flash - a vigilante reassumes his supercharged secret identity
shows.descriptionEpg: Back in a flash. A vigilante reassumes his supercharged secret identity. With his family at risk, a school principal leaps back into action as the hero who can harness electricity.

shows.title: Star Wars: Andor
shows.description: Star Wars: Andor
shows.descriptionEpg: In a dangerous era, Cassian Andor embarks on a path destined to turn him into a rebel hero. To stream more series, sign up to Disney+.

shows.title: Doom Patrol
shows.description: Meet the misfit heroes forged by tragedy - Brendan Fraser stars
shows.descriptionEpg: Brendan Fraser, Timothy Dalton and Michelle Gomez are the misfit heroes with powers forged by tragedy. Watch them battle to defend humanity from evil.

shows.title: Smallville
shows.description: Superman - the early years... catch every episode of this hit show
shows.descriptionEpg: Hit US Drama about Superman’s early years. As he struggles with the transition from boy to man, Clark finds that his strange abilities set him apart from his peers.

shows.title: Transformers
shows.description: A thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons!
shows.descriptionEpg: A thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, starring Megan Fox. An epic struggle unfolds on Earth, and one man becomes humanity’s last hope for survival.

shows.title: Roswell, New Mexico
shows.description: Strange encounters, dark secrets - don’t miss this otherworldly drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Strange encounters, dark secrets - don’t miss this otherworldly drama. A woman gets an odd feeling about her high school crush. He’s charming, mysterious & not even remotely human...

shows.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
shows.description: Guardians of the Galaxy
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Marvel’s new team in an action-packed, epic space adventure. To stream more movies, sign up to Disney+.

shows.title: Mrs Davis
shows.description: Meet the kick-ass nun fighting AI in a high-stakes battle
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet the kick-ass nun fighting AI in a high-stakes battle - from the creator of Lost. Expect danger, laughs and a lot of twists and turns on this madcap thrill ride.

shows.title: Extraordinary
shows.description: Young, broke & powerless? Catch the smash-hit comedy!
shows.descriptionEpg: Young, broke & powerless? Máiréad Tyers stars as Jen, the only person without a superpower. Watch her navigate life, armed with nothing but hope (and desperation!).

shows.title: FlashForward
shows.description: Don't miss this pacy, futuristic thriller starring Joseph Fiennes
shows.descriptionEpg: Don't miss this pacy thriller with Joseph Fiennes. A mysterious global event causes utter devastation, with planes falling and cars crashing - humanity's fight for survival starts here...

collection.headingTitle: AMC Stories: Stunning drama, hilarious tales & powerful docs

shows.title: AMC Stories: Stunning drama, hilarious tales & powerful docs
shows.subtitle: From sweeping dramas and comedy classics, to powerful documentaries that have you hooked from the word go - catch all the best shows from AMC.

shows.title: Hap and Leonard
shows.description: Unlikely sleuths, a hunt for lost loot. Don’t miss this darkly comic tale
shows.descriptionEpg: Unlikely sleuths, a hunt for lost loot. Don’t miss this darkly comic tale about a pair of odd-couple amateur investigators. Starring James Purefoy & The Wire’s Michael K. Williams.

shows.title: La Fortuna
shows.description: Riches and rivalries - a thrilling adventure drama with Stanley Tucci
shows.descriptionEpg: Riches and rivalries - Stanley Tucci stars in this international adventure thriller about the murky world of treasure hunting, as competing agencies fight to claim a historic shipwreck.

shows.title: Halt and Catch Fire
shows.description: Greed, egos and tech bros—one of the decade’s best US dramas
shows.descriptionEpg: Greed, egos and tech bros—one of the decade’s best US dramas. Brilliant minds race to shape the future in this gripping tale of the birth of the PC and the rise of the internet.

shows.title: The Terror
shows.description: Ridley Scott’s eerie anthology returns - has evil crossed the ocean?
shows.descriptionEpg: Ridley Scott’s eerie anthology returns - has evil crossed the ocean? Malevolent forces haunt a community confined to one of America's WWII internment camps.

shows.title: NOS4A2
shows.description: A young woman battles a soul-stealing villain - supernatural thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: A young woman battles a soul-stealing villain - supernatural thriller. Follow Vic McQueen as she wages war against Charlie Manx, who traps children in a twisted, Christmas-themed world.

shows.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
shows.description: The murders that shocked a nation - delve into the staggering story
shows.descriptionEpg: Powerful docu-series charting the murders that shocked a nation. Delve into the shocking story of the Clutter Family murders, made famous by Truman Capote's book.

shows.title: Cannes Confidential
shows.description: Secrets, scandals, and stunning views in this glitzy drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Secrets, scandals, and stunning views in this glitzy drama! A detective teams up with a con artist to crack cases in Cannes.

shows.title: Deadwax
shows.description: Vinyl hunting takes a deadly turn - catch the mind-bending thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Vinyl hunting takes a deadly turn - catch the mind-bending thriller. A vinyl tracker must find a legendary rare record that drives its owners mad and kills anyone who hears it.

shows.title: Stan Against Evil
shows.description: The only thing worse than evil demons? Stan’s attitude
shows.descriptionEpg: The only thing worse than evil demons? Stan’s attitude. When angry spirits haunt a small town, an angrier Sheriff must stop them. Spooky comedy with Scrubs star John C. McGinley.

shows.title: The Son
shows.description: Violence, greed & family ties - Pierce Brosnan is a ruthless oil tycoon
shows.descriptionEpg: Pierce Brosnan stars in this sweeping family epic about one man's path to riches. Watch young Eli McCullough transform from good-natured innocence to calculated violence.

shows.title: Finding Joy
shows.description: A charmingly filthy comedy starring Amy Huberman & Aisling Bea!
shows.descriptionEpg: Charmingly filthy comedy starring Amy Huberman & Aisling Bea. Poor Joy is having a tough time after a messy breakup when a promotion forces her to step out of her comfort zone.

shows.title: Documentary Now!
shows.description: Documentaries... but not as you know them - stream these smart spoofs
shows.descriptionEpg: Documentaries you love... but not as you know them. A roster of stars including Helen Mirren, Jack Black and Owen Wilson lend their acting chops to this sharply funny spoof series.

shows.title: The Ice Cream Girls
shows.description: Chilling crime drama - two teen girls face accusations of murder
shows.descriptionEpg: Chilling crime drama about two vulnerable teen girls who get accused of murder. For years, they go their separate ways, until they are forced to confront each other.

metadata.DESC: Discover the latest Drama & Soaps from ITV or catch-up on the shows you've missed. ITVX - The UK's freshest streaming service.
